acidHouseChain.name: Acid House Foundation Chain

plugins.configuration: Square + Sawtooth blend, high resonance sweep
Distortion + Cabinet for classic acid tone

acidHouseChain.nativeBenefits: Direct TB-303 modeling, integrated distortion, tempo-synced manipulation
acidHouseChain.breaksIfSwapped: Third-party TB-303 emulations lack integrated distortion, Gross Beat provides unique stutter algorithms

cinematicPadChain.name: Evolving Cinematic Pad

plugins.configuration: Import image for texture, use Prism for metallic content
Slow X/Y modulation for evolving texture

cinematicPadChain.nativeBenefits: Direct image-to-spectrum conversion, synthesis-level shimmer, real-time modulation
cinematicPadChain.breaksIfSwapped: Third-party reverbs can't create synthesis-level shimmer effects

trapDrumChain.name: Modern Trap Drum Kit

plugins.configuration: Boost snare attack, control kick sustain

trapDrumChain.nativeBenefits: Realistic cymbal modeling, tempo-synced half-speed, per-transient shaping
trapDrumChain.breaksIfSwapped: Gross Beat exclusive to Signature+, physical modeling realism

fmLeadChain.name: Crystal FM Lead

plugins.configuration: 64x oversampling, feedback FM for metallic content

fmLeadChain.nativeBenefits: High oversampling, direct modulation routing, shimmer effects

analogWarmChain.name: Vintage Analog Warmth

plugins.configuration: Juno-6 DCO character, BBD chorus engaged

analogWarmChain.nativeBenefits: DCO and OTA modeling, analog non-linearities, BBD chorus emulation
analogWarmChain.breaksIfSwapped: Accurate analog circuit simulation, specific chorus algorithms

organicStringsChain.name: Organic String Ensemble

plugins.configuration: Violin contact, medium tension, wooden body resonance

organicStringsChain.nativeBenefits: Physical behavior modeling, spectral snapshots, integrated tuning correction

metallicTexturesChain.name: Metallic Texture Generator

plugins.configuration: High harmonic count, Richness parameter for shimmer

metallicTexturesChain.nativeBenefits: 32,767 harmonic capability, synthesis-level effects, real-time modulation
metallicTexturesChain.breaksIfSwapped: Unprecedented harmonic count, native shimmer integration

liveRemixChain.name: Live Remix Performance Chain

plugins.configuration: Real-time loop triggering based on input

liveRemixChain.nativeBenefits: Dynamic audio reaction, transient-based vs grid-based, real-time harmonization
liveRemixChain.breaksIfSwapped: Transporter's dynamic reaction, Pitcher's MIDI harmonization

vocalProcessingChain.name: Professional Vocal Chain

plugins.configuration: Fast speed for robotic effect, scale-based correction

vocalProcessingChain.nativeBenefits: Real-time vs offline approaches, integrated vocoder carrier, intelligibility engine

hybridSynthesisChain.name: Hybrid Synthesis Powerhouse
hybridSynthesisChain.nativeBenefits: WAV loading in FM, spectrum refinement, preset integration

masterBusChain.name: Master Bus Processing Chain
masterBusChain.nativeBenefits: Graphical curve drawing, Pre/post emphasis, frequency splitting
masterBusChain.breaksIfSwapped: Curve drawing, linear-phase processing, frequency-split operation

glitchDesignChain.name: Glitch Sound Design
glitchDesignChain.nativeBenefits: Dynamic vs static looping, analog instability, real-time performance
